languages.text: "Госпожа Хейдари, мое терпение сложно истощить, но у вас почти получилось. Повторяю еще раз: нет, я не выдам вам никакую печать. Ни за честное слово, ни за взятку".

traits.locale_text: "Госпожа Хейдари, мое терпение сложно истощить, но у вас почти получилось. Повторяю еще раз: нет, я не выдам вам никакую печать. Ни за честное слово, ни за взятку".

languages.text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Хейдари, мое терпение сложно истощить, но у вас почти получилось. Повторяю еще раз: нет, я не выдам вам никакую печать. Ни за честное слово, ни за взятку".

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

"Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

"Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

"Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

languages.text: “海达利女士，我是个相当有耐心的人，但你已经快把我的耐心耗尽了。我再重复一遍：不行，我不会给你盖任何印章。无论你说什么花言巧语，或者拿什么东西贿赂我，都不行。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: “海达利女士，我是个相当有耐心的人，但你已经快把我的耐心耗尽了。我再重复一遍：不行，我不会给你盖任何印章。无论你说什么花言巧语，或者拿什么东西贿赂我，都不行。”

languages.text: «Señora Heydari, es difícil llegar al límite de mi paciencia, pero usted lo está consiguiendo. Me repetiré una vez más: no, no pienso darle ningún sello. Ni a cambio de su palabra ni por un soborno».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: «Señora Heydari, es difícil llegar al límite de mi paciencia, pero usted lo está consiguiendo. Me repetiré una vez más: no, no pienso darle ningún sello. Ni a cambio de su palabra ni por un soborno».

languages.text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリ、私の忍耐はそう簡単に尽きませんが、あなたはそろそろ尽きようとしているのでは？もう一度言いましょう。私はあなたに印章を渡すつもりはありません。本物の約束を口にしようとも、賄賂を送ろうとも揺るぎません」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリ、私の忍耐はそう簡単に尽きませんが、あなたはそろそろ尽きようとしているのでは？もう一度言いましょう。私はあなたに印章を渡すつもりはありません。本物の約束を口にしようとも、賄賂を送ろうとも揺るぎません」

languages.text: « Maîtresse Heydari, j'ai beau avoir une patience d'ange, vous commencez à me taper sur les nerfs. Pour la dernière fois, non, je ne vous délivrerai pas de sceau, ni sur votre seule bonne mine ni pour tous les pots-de-vin du monde. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Heydari, j'ai beau avoir une patience d'ange, vous commencez à me taper sur les nerfs. Pour la dernière fois, non, je ne vous délivrerai pas de sceau, ni sur votre seule bonne mine ni pour tous les pots-de-vin du monde. »

languages.text: "Herrin Heydari, ich habe viel Geduld, aber bald ist sie am Ende. Ich wiederhole mich noch einmal: Nein, von mir bekommt Ihr kein Siegel. Nicht für Euer aufrichtiges Wort, nicht für eine Bestechung."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Heydari, ich habe viel Geduld, aber bald ist sie am Ende. Ich wiederhole mich noch einmal: Nein, von mir bekommt Ihr kein Siegel. Nicht für Euer aufrichtiges Wort, nicht für eine Bestechung."

languages.text: "Üstat Heydari, sabrı öyle kolay tükenen birisi değilimdir ama sabır taşım çatladı çatlayacak. Bir kez daha söylüyorum: Hayır. Şerefinle söz de versen, rüşvet de versen sana hiçbir mühür verecek değilim."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari, my patience is not easily exhausted, but you are coming very close. I shall repeat myself again: no, I will be not issuing you any seal. Not in exchange for your honest word, nor for a bribe."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Heydari, sabrı öyle kolay tükenen birisi değilimdir ama sabır taşım çatladı çatlayacak. Bir kez daha söylüyorum: Hayır, şerefinle söz de versen, rüşvet de versen, sana hiçbir mühür verecek değilim."
